projects.name: Cat or Dog Classifier
projects.description: Using transfer learning is an effective way to gain insight when data is limited. Using a model that was previously trained on a large dataset in a similar domain and only using a small amount of data to train

projects.name: Disaster Response Pipeline
projects.description: Using a sklearn pipeline enables the deployment of a robust machinel earning model.

projects.name: Dog Breed Classifier
projects.description: CNNs are excillent at using image data to perform inference. In this project a cnn is trained to identify dog breed from images of dogs.

projects.name: Facial Keypoint Detection
projects.description: Understanding facial expressions is a trivial task for our brains.
